column4: hm. Now, what the heck do I do to get pulseaudio to use alsa?
just upgraded to 10.04, and I have no sound unless I start up esd, funnily enough.
I had good luck with the 'nosound' section in here: http://www.unixmen.com/linux-tutorials/937-things-to-do-after-installing-ubuntu-1004-lts-lucid-lynx
